name: Valhall 2000
description: Challenge your friends and enemies to endless battles in Valhall 2000! Fight head to head in a multiplayer 2D platform style shooter. Pick up an AK47 or a Rocket Launcher and blast them all! Other game modes include coop adventure puzzle, zombie, and time attack race.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory, with OpenGL 3.0+ support DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
